org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi

Interface OptionsService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptionsServiceImpl

    public interface OptionsService
extends Service
    Access point to OGM specific metadata information.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext
      Contain a group of options separated in different scopes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext context()
      The context containing all the options
      OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext context(SessionImplementor session)
      The context containing all the session dependent options

    • Method Detail

      • context

        OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext context()
        The context containing all the options
        Returns:
        the context containing all the options that do not depend from the session

      • context

        OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext context(SessionImplementor session)
        The context containing all the session dependent options
        Parameters:
        session - the session to use to obtain the value of the options
        Returns:
        the context containing all the options that are session dependent
